attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take urgent action, military if required to remove the present government of Zimbabwe and to cause it to be replaced by a legally elected government which is of the people and for the people of Zimbabwe.  Surely the present government (of Zimbabwe) must have broken the terms of the Lancaster house independance agreement.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
